attributes.action: OVERTURN THE DECISION TO CLOSE ST JOHN'S HOME IN DOWNPATRICK COUNTY DOWN
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
THIS PETITION SUPPORTS THE EFFORTS OF ALL IN THE DOWNPATRICK AREA OF COUNTY DOWN TO OPPOSE THE DECISION BY THE DOWN LISBURN TRUST TO CLOSE ST JOHNS HOME IN DOWNPATRICK.
FOR MANY RESIDENTS ST JOHNS HAS BEEN AN IDEAL HOME TO SPEND THEIR REMAINING YEARS IN COMFORT AND HAPPINESS AND BEING LOOKED AFTER BY A BRILLIANT TEAM OF STAFF.
THE DOWN LISBURN TRUST HAVE A SLOGAN PROVIDING LIFELONG HEALTH AND CARE.FOR THE RESIDENTS CONCERNED THIS IS AN EMPTY PROMISE!! IN SIGNING THIS PETITION WE ASK THE PRIME MINISTER TO SUPPORT THE RESIDENTS OF ST JOHNS HOME IN DOWNPATRICK IN THEIR WISH TO STAY AND STOP THE CLOSURE IN ITS TRACKS

rejection.details: Please do not use BLOCK CAPS, as they are more difficult to read. Please re-submit in upper and lower case.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
